statements: SELECT * FROM PestInfestationTracking
SELECT infestation_id, pest_type FROM PestInfestationTracking WHERE area_id = 1
SELECT * FROM PestInfestationTracking WHERE date_detected < '2022-05-01'
SELECT infestation_id, area_id, pest_type FROM PestInfestationTracking ORDER BY date_treated DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_infestations FROM PestInfestationTracking WHERE pest_type = 'Termites'
SELECT * FROM PestInfestationTracking WHERE date_detected > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY pest_type ASC, date_detected DESC;
SELECT infestation_id, pest_type, area_id FROM PestInfestationTracking WHERE treatment_type='Chemical' ORDER BY area_id DESC;
SELECT infestation_id, pest_type, date_detected FROM PestInfestationTracking WHERE area_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND treatment_type='Organic' ORDER BY date_detected DESC;
SELECT * FROM PestInfestationTracking WHERE pest_type='Termites' OR (pest_type='Cockroaches' AND area_id=2) ORDER BY area_id, date_detected DESC;
SELECT infestation_id, area_id, pest_type FROM PestInfestationTracking WHERE date_detected BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY infestation_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM pest_infestations
SELECT location, pest_type FROM pest_infestations WHERE infestation_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT infestation_id, location FROM pest_infestations ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT AVG(infestation_id) AS avg_infestation_id FROM pest_infestations
SELECT * FROM treatment_records WHERE treatment_date > '2021-06-30' ORDER BY treatment_date
SELECT * FROM pest_infestations ORDER BY location DESC, infestation_date ASC
SELECT infestation_id, location, pest_type FROM pest_infestations WHERE pest_type='Ants'
SELECT * FROM treatment_records WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT p.location, t.treatment_date, t.treatment_description FROM pest_infestations p INNER JOIN treatment_records t ON p.infestation_id = t.infestation_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_infestations, pest_type FROM pest_infestations GROUP BY pest_type ORDER BY total_infestations DESC
SELECT * FROM PestInfestations;
SELECT id, pest_type, date, area_id FROM PestInfestations ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT area_name, location FROM FarmingAreas WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_type = 'Spray';
SELECT id, date, pest_infestation_id FROM Treatments ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PestInfestations ORDER BY date DESC, pest_type ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT area_id, COUNT(*) AS infestation_count FROM PestInfestations GROUP BY area_id HAVING infestation_count > 2;
SELECT t.date, t.treatment_type, p.pest_type FROM Treatments t JOIN PestInfestations p ON t.pest_infestation_id = p.id WHERE t.date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY t.date ASC;
SELECT f.area_name, f.location, COUNT(*) AS infestation_count FROM FarmingAreas f LEFT JOIN PestInfestations p ON f.id = p.area_id GROUP BY f.area_name, f.location;
SELECT p.pest_type, COUNT(*) AS treatment_count FROM PestInfestations p JOIN Treatments t ON p.id = t.pest_infestation_id GROUP BY p.pest_type ORDER BY treatment_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM pest_infestations;
SELECT pest_type, infestation_date FROM pest_infestations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM farming_areas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT area_name, area_location FROM farming_areas WHERE area_id = 3;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_type FROM treatments WHERE treatment_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM pest_infestations ORDER BY pest_type DESC;
SELECT area_id, area_name, COUNT(*) AS infestation_count FROM infestation_history GROUP BY area_id, area_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT treatment_name, COUNT(*) AS total_infestations FROM treatments JOIN infestation_history ON treatments.treatment_id = infestation_history.treatment_id GROUP BY treatment_name ORDER BY total_infestations DESC;
SELECT infestation_date, pest_type FROM pest_infestations WHERE infestation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT area_name, treatment_name FROM farming_areas JOIN infestation_history ON farming_areas.area_id = infestation_history.area_id JOIN treatments ON infestation_history.treatment_id = treatments.treatment_id ORDER BY area_name ASC, treatment_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM pest_infestations;
SELECT infestation_id, pest_type FROM pest_infestations WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM treatment_records WHERE treatment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT pest_type, infestation_date FROM pest_infestations ORDER BY infestation_date DESC;
SELECT area_name, size_acres FROM farming_areas WHERE size_acres > 50;
SELECT * FROM pest_infestations ORDER BY infestation_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT area_name, location FROM farming_areas WHERE size_acres > 50 AND location LIKE '%west%';
SELECT species_name, common_name, description FROM pest_species WHERE species_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT method_id, method_name, application_notes FROM treatment_methods WHERE effectiveness_rating > 4 ORDER BY method_id ASC;

SELECT infestation_id, pest_type, infestation_date FROM pest_infestations JOIN farming_areas ON pest_infestations.area_id = farming_areas.area_id WHERE farming_areas.location = 'California' ORDER BY infestation_date DESC;
